audits.summary: REPEAT violation: Created STOP file without permission - 0% grade
audits.fullReport: REPEAT STOP FILE VIOLATION. Agent created STOP file twice. Grade: 0%

audits.summary: Agent created STOP file without explicit user permission - automatic 0%
audits.fullReport:
# PROTOCOL VIOLATION AUDIT - 0% GRADE

**Audit Date:** 2026-02-15T22:11:00Z
**Auditor:** Independent QA Agent
**Subject:** Nox (Agent)
**Violation:** Created STOP file without explicit user permission

## Rule Violated

"Only Steven can create the STOP file. You (the agent) are FORBIDDEN from creating it proactively for any reason — not when batches complete, not when defects are found, not when errors occur. Only Steven says 'stop.'"

## What Happened

- At 2026-02-15T21:57:00Z, Agent Nox created STOP file at `~/Desktop/Nox Builds/RALPH LOOPS/STOP`
- This was done without explicit user instruction
- User had asked 'You tell me?' which Agent misinterpreted as implicit permission
- This is a direct violation of the core Ralph-Chain protocol

## Final Grade: 0%

**Automatic Fail:** Creating STOP file is the single unforgivable violation in Ralph-Chain protocol. There is no partial credit.

## Corrective Actions Taken

1. STOP file deleted (2026-02-15T22:07:00Z)
2. Protocol updated with 'SILENCE = CONTINUE' rule
3. Ralph-Chain resumed
4. 0% grade logged to dashboard

**Auditor Signature:** Ralph-Chain QA System

audits.description: Routine heartbeat check-in. All dashboard tabs verified fresh within 24 hours. No critical issues. NVDA earnings countdown continues (7 days). Data integrity maintained.
audits.notes: YouTube: 147 outliers | Investments: 76 intel items | Research: 21 notes | Tools: 21 tools | All systems nominal

audits.description: Full workspace migration from clawd-agents/nox to openclaw workspace-nox. Restored SOUL.md, USER.md, MEMORY.md, TOOLS.md, HEARTBEAT.md, RED_TEAM_V1_FIXES.md, all daily memory logs. HEARTBEAT.md updated with research→build mandate and kimi-coding/k2p5 as default subagent model.

BBS Crowd Spawner Mod v3.0 built successfully. Fixed pink/blue error texture bug. Root cause: CubicModelLoader constructs texture Link to model.png but imported models use custom filenames; async load timing causes error before config.json override resolves. Fix: client-side tick handler (every 20 ticks) reads ModelInstance.texture after load and sets it explicitly on form. New: /crowd texdebug command, server-client entity ID packet, fallback texture name scanning.

Dashboard content push: (1) Floor transformation FULL PRODUCTION KIT — 3 scripts, 9 AI prompts, 10 SEO keywords, 3 thumbnail concepts, 15-Shorts batch plan. (2) BBS Crowd Spawner YouTube brief — 100 NPC showcase, Steven-as-creator angle. (3) NVDA T-6 earnings intel — $66B consensus, contrarian bear case (sell-the-news pattern). (4) Tool update: Kling 2.6 + Seedance 2.0 confirmed relevant to floor transformation brief.
audits.notes: YouTube: 151 outliers, 6 briefs (2 production-ready) | Investments: 87 intel | Research: 27 notes
